piece.name: Bal du moulin de la Galette (Dance at Le moulin de la Galette)
piece.description: This painting is one of Impresionism's most celebrated masterpieces that shows a snapshot of real life with a richness of form, a fluidity of brush strokes, and a flickering, sun-dappled light. There exists a smaller version of the same picture that is now believed to be in a private collection in Switzerland. The big painting is currently housed at the Mus√©e d'Orsay in Paris.
